project_name.justification: The project is explicitly named in the text: '...Libra's Flanders South, Flanders North and Soules Bay-Caron (the "SBC Project") lithium projects...'

company_name.justification: The text states that Libra entered into an earn-in agreement with 'a wholly-owned Canadian subsidiary of KoBold Metals Company ("KoBold") to jointly explore Libra's Flanders South... lithium projects'.

ceo_buyer.justification: The text does not mention the name of the CEO for the buyer, KoBold Metals Company. It only lists the CEOs for Libra Lithium Corp. and PowerStone Metals Corp.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text mentions an 'earn-in agreement' but does not specify the percentage of interest that can be acquired by KoBold Metals.

primary_commodity.justification: The text refers to the projects, including Flanders South, as 'lithium projects'.

verified_article_link.justification: The article, sourced from the provided URL, discusses the earn-in agreement involving the Flanders South project.

currency.justification: The companies involved (Libra Lithium, PowerStone Metals) are Canadian, and PowerStone is listed on the Canadian Securities Exchange (CSE), implying the currency for the '$33M earn-in deal' is Canadian Dollars (CAD).

cash_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any cash payments as part of the earn-in agreement. The $33M figure is an exploration commitment.

share_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any share payments as part of the earn-in agreement for the Flanders South project.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The text does not mention a combined cash and share payment for the earn-in agreement.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The text does not mention any shares being issued as part of the earn-in agreement for the Flanders South project.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any share warrant payments as part of the transaction.

option_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any option payments as part of the transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the earn-in agreement, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text does not specify an exploration commitment in terms of meters drilled.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The project's share is $11,000,000, calculated as one-third of the total $33,000,000 commitment shared between three projects (Flanders North, Flanders South, and Soules Bay-Caron) as stated: 'Libra's Flanders North, Flanders South, and Soules Bay-Caron projects in Ontario are being explored under a $33M earn-in deal with KoBold Metals Company.'

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text does not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) being acquired or retained as part of the transaction.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text does not specify the coverage area for the Flanders South project.

coverage_area_unit.justification: The text does not specify the coverage area for the Flanders South project, so there is no unit.

resource_size.justification: The text does not contain any statement of a mineral resource for the Flanders South project.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is KoBold Metals Company, for which no stock ticker or exchange is provided in the text. The ticker mentioned, CSE:PS, belongs to PowerStone Metals Corp., which is involved in a separate RTO transaction with Libra, but is not the buyer in the project earn-in.
